players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I'm the mafioso, be cautious. Charlie is the detective."
You: "Bob was killed last night. Diana claims to be mafioso, Charlie detective. Watch out!"
Charlie: "Diana confessed to being mafioso. I'm the detective. Alice, do you have any info?"
Charlie: "I'm the detective. Diana confessed to mafia. Alice, any info?"
Diana: "I'm the mafioso, beware. Charlie is the detective. Stay cautious."
You: "Charlie is the detective. Be cautious of Diana."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested
